issue.title: [CF 987] [Request] "If castable" condition.
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.2

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Hello!
My request is regarding the "Spell cooldown" Icon type.
Currently there are 2 filters for this type:
1. Range check.
2. Power check.
My suggestion is to add a "Castable check" aswell (i.e. it would ignore to show tracked spells if you were to be silenced).

Useful for cast-sequence recommendations etc.


> Posted by CurseForge user Waspp | Imported from CurseForge issue #987 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be noted that currently the "Show state & opacity" setting shows a spell as "Usable" even though you are silenced.

Edited Aug 17, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Waspp

Use conditions for this. Create a buff/debuff icon to track silence effects on yourself, and then add that icon as an Icon Shown condition to all the icons that you want to have hidden when you are silenced.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Thanks for taking the time and answering silly questions like mine.

This hides the whole icon when you get silenced, what i'm trying to achiev is to only hide abilities that cannot be casted.

A binary example: Judgement isn't affected by silence. Exorcism is affected by silence.

If i track both spells in one icon and use conditions like the way you described, judgement wont appear even though it is "castable" - when i get silenced.

Edited Aug 17, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Waspp
